original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes stronger at 293.00/20 to dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 293.00/20 to the US dollar Wednesday after opening at 293.50/60, dealers said, while bond yields were steady.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 11.75/80 percent, from 11.70/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.06.2029 closed stable at 11.95/12.10 percent. (Colombo/Oct30/2024)
